reviews.text: What you see is what you get. Unpretentious and basic, but doesn't claim to be anything else, so represents good value for money. Rooms are smallish but comfortable and clean. Location is excellent, just a minute's walk from the Binnen Alster, with U-Bahn station round the corner. If you want a simple but clean and convenient hotel in Central Hamburg it's difficult to do better.
reviews.title: WYSIWYG

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel Oper is a cheap and cheerful hotel in a great central location in Hamburg. The room was tiny, really tiny; and the bathroom is minscule; but being less than 250m from the waterfront, and with a parking garage, this was a great value stay in Hamburg. There's no views, no in-room fridge or coffee-making etc, but there's dozens of great cafe's etc a short walk down at the waterfront.
reviews.title: Great Location in Hamburg

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is stuck in a 70's time-warp, and I suspect the whole place is in serious need of a makeover, but you'll be hard pressed to find a better location, especially at this price!
reviews.title: Best price for this location

likes.disliked: — The decor but even that wasn't too bad

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel in December 2006 and our experience left me quite surprised at some of the other reviews. We were travelling on a budget so wanted somewhere cheap (but clean) to stay in the centre of Hamburg, which is quite a dificult task.
reviews.title: Not proper for non-smokers

likes.disliked: — Having to breath smoke while staying there

reviews.text: The hotel is a little old fashioned in terms of the decor and strangely has a car park on the floors between the reception and the rooms! However, you will struggle to find a better hotel for this price in this location. The rooms are clean, quiet and comfortable and the staff were friendly. I would recommend getting breakfast elsewhere if you can or do not have it included, we did this everyday because Hamburg has countless quality restaurants, cafes and snack bars to choose from.
reviews.title: Good Value but need to fix the hotel website
